amendment.description: Amendment requests the Secretary of State to review the travel warning for Israel, the West Bank, and Gaza to determine which areas present the highest threat to American citizens in the region and which areas may be visited safely.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 107-62 to express the sense of Congress that the Secretary of State be directed to review the current Travel Warning in place for Israel, the West Bank and Gaza to determine which areas within those regions may be visited safely and which areas present the highest risk to Americans traveling abroad.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lantos amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
